name: Before ED-IT : C1400 - (Limited Edition of 1)
description: BE_C1400 - Limited Edition of 1 in this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. BE_C1400 stands at 10.6cm / 4.2" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: The 2068 ‘Law of Awareness’ granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, and changed the way the working world existed. The C1400 series (pre 2068) are found surveying your nearest family Spaceport using their superior visual equipment, keeping an eye on everything which is taking place. They work closely with the C1200 series on transport jobs by using their additional ocular device to pinpoint exactly where items need to be positioned. Not as physcially strong as their friends the C1200 series, they make up for this by being insanely precise. Keeping your local Spaceport© safe since 2055. Postage information: UK: Recorded Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £40, requires a signature on arrival. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. BE_C1400 orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: Before ED-IT : C1200 - (Limited Edition of 1)
description: BE_C1200 - Limited Edition of 1 in this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. BE_C1200 stands at 10.6cm / 4.2" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: The 2068 ‘Law of Awareness’ granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, and changed the way the working world existed. The C1200 series (pre 2068) would mainly be seen scutling around your nearest Spaceport on their low friction (but high torque) wheelbase. They were the backbone of the stellar travel industry, as they moved large shipments from the loading zones into the gargantuan space freighters. For their size they are super strong, acknowledged to be capable of lifting 4000 times their own weight, they are not be trifled with when it comes to moving items, large or small. It really shows on their trusty Toughskin®, they can take a hit. If you need something moved, and need it moved quickly, you know who to call (fax). Postage information: UK: Recorded Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £40, requires a signature on arrival. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. BE_C1200 orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: Before ED-IT : B5100 - (Limited Edition of 1)
description: Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself. BE_B5100 stands at 15.5cm / just over 6" tall. ‘Before ED-IT’ is a new range of handmade resin robots which detail the life of the ED-IT DJ’s before they formed the group. First up is B5100 in the pre ‘Law of Awareness’ working colour. Background: The 2068 ‘Law of Awareness’ granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, and changed the way the working world existed. The B5100 series (pre 2068) were primarily employed to work on governmental architectural projects as an electrical maintenance engineers. The work was sometimes dangerous and often involved working around Class Q Construction Platforms, which were never known to be very caring about their movements, and this shows in the outer modular 'Toughskin®' of this B5100. Many B5100 bots were happy to keep any damage to their working kit as a sign of what a tough series they really are. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. All previous ED-IT owners have used an international trackable service. I will send over details about this service. Orders will dispatch 1 day after purchase.

name: B5100_OQ - from the ED-IT DJ's team
description: *Available Thursday 4th July @ 9PM BST (UK time)* The B5100_OQ release is a limited edition of 1 of this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100_OQ comes with a well used underground club desk and two 'Accex' sound creating devices. B5100_OQ stands at 15.5cm / just over 6" tall. Please see postage information below. Background: An ever popular gameshow in Okinawa which is aired every night at 23.00 hours is the 'Open Quality' hour. On this show, local musicians are each given 20 minutes to put on a performance, and residents all over Japan vote for their favourite act. B5100 won the show with an overwhelming 99.2% of the vote on the show broadcast 12.05.2074. That performance was key in capturing the thought processes of the viewers and went on to thrust the ED-IT DJ crew into the limelight. This colourway is to remember that momentous occasion. Further information : There may be slight imperfections due to this being a hand cast resin item, but I will always do my best to avoid this occuring. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. I will send over details about the International Insured Service to the buyer of B5100_OQ after purchase. Orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: D4488 - from the ED-IT DJ's team
description: *Available Thursday 4th July @ 9PM BST (UK time)* This inaugural D4488 release is a limited edition of 1 of this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100_OQ stands at 13cm / just over 5" tall. Please see postage information below. Background: D4488 is all about security and surveillance when the ED-IT DJ’s are on the road. Working closely alongside his colleague B5600sec1, they are often seen scanning the crowds for any trouble, or checking holographic fire exits for faults.Before joining the ED-IT DJ team, the D4488 units were primarily used as measuring droids on large architectural builds, due to their high level of accuracy and attention to detail. They are totally addicted to chocolate milk, you can see the joy in their eye ports when it's milk time. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. I will send over details about the International Insured Service to the buyer of D4488 after purchase. Orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: Z9900_k1 - from the ED-IT DJ's team - (Limited edition of 1)
description: The Z9900_k1 release is limited to 1 of this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. Z9900_k1 stands at 12.5cm / 5" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: Belonging to the IT series of the ED-IT DJ collaboration crew, these wild eyed guys are fresh from the factory floor. Once taken out of production (by humans) due to how intense and hyperactive they could be, they were reactivated after the passing of the 2068 Law of Awareness. The Z9900_k series primarily work at Accex Systems creating drum machines, and can sometimes be found on the stage before a ED-IT DJ production working as a 'hype crew'. Postage information: UK: Recorded Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £40, requires a signature on arrival. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. I will also email over information on this after purchase. Z9900_k1 orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: Z7200 - from the ED-IT DJ's team
description: This Z7200 colour way release is limited to just 1, and comes with his own beaten up club desk and three Accex sound machines. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. Z7200 stands at 15.3cm / 6" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: Z7200 is a founding member of the ED-IT DJ partnership alongside B5100. Not often seen on stage or in the public eye, they operate behind the scenes and run the sister business of ACCEX, which develop and produce the machines that the crew use. Every so often they will trial new prototypes by performing impromptu sessions at the Berlin arm of their 'Ready Place' clubs. So, if you enjoy a discussion on the latest trends in pattern chips or the processing speed of a Trylon© drive, you know exactly who to speak with. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. I will send over details about the International Insured Service to the buyer of Z7200 after purchase. Orders will dispatch 1-2 days after purchase.

name: B6400 - from the ED-IT DJ's team - (Limited edition of 2)
description: The B6400 release is limited to 2 in the 'Accex Green' colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100 stands at 15cm / just under 6" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: The core ED-IT DJ's would struggle to put on a show without their trusty friends the B6400 series. Once confined to audio management of human concerts and internet broadcasts, these bots joined the ED-IT team and have put their skills to good use. From the very initial concept of a new show, through the to the final beat produced, B6400 are watching and tweaking via their expansive plethora of equipment. They work closely with partner company Accex to develop new machines and push boundaries. B6400 are also partial to a good cheese burger. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. B6400 orders will dispatch 2-5 days after purchase. I will keep purchasers up to date with shipping times.

name: C1200 - from the ED-IT DJ's team - (Limited edition of 3)
description: C1200 - Limited Edition of 3 in colourway 1 - '2068 Party'. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. C1200 stands at 10.6cm / 4.2" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: Before the 2068 'Law of Awareness' which granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, you would have been seen these C1200 bots scuttling around your nearest Spaceport on their low friction (but high torque) wheelbase. They were the backbone of the stellar travel industry, as they moved large shipments from the loading zones into the gargantuan space freighters. For their size they are super strong, acknowledged to be capable of lifting 4000 times their own weight, they are not be trifled with when it comes to moving items, large or small. Post 2068 many of these mighty bots joined the ED-IT DJ crew as roadies and venue organisers, and can be found before and after any performance dismantling and loading the huge structures or equipment which they are in charge of. Known to like a party, they can often be found at the local Karaoke spot, getting fresh after a gig. Postage information: UK: Recorded Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £40, requires a signature on arrival. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. C1200 orders will dispatch 1-4 days after purchase.

name: B56002LC_b - from the ED-IT DJ's team - (Limited edition of 1)
description: *Available Thursday 7th February at 9pm (GMT UK time)* This B56002LC_b release is limited to just 1. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B56002LC_b stands at 15.3cm / 6 tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: When performing, the ED-IT DJ's have a very strong team around them. Formed of primarily colleagues from the factory days, they have an eclectic mix of skills and will always work their hardest. At the core of the visually intense, atmospheric and personal shows that the ED-IT DJ's put on, the B56002LC (2 Light Crew) brothers (a and b) are often seen fiddling around behind a flashing panel of intensity. Specialists in light engineering and tertiary reverse segmention, their outer casings are carved directly from an experimental hyper fluorescent engagement material. This specialist component has wireless fibre links to the soundboard which causes them to pulsate and glow in time to the music. It's a sight to be seen. Official ED-IT DJ's Information: Tesselate is proud to announce that he has won the licence to produce official limited edition ED-IT merchandise. After many meetings and lengthy discussions with the group, we have big plans going forward. ED-IT are a group of technology based DJ's who have grown into a large force within the underground music scene. Ever since the 2068 'Law of Awareness' which granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, the group has gained a following and have rapidly taken their performances worldwide. Based in the UK, Toyko & Berlin, they have a residency at their underground clubs 'Ready Place', where they play at least once a month. All of the machines they use to create their music and also play music live, they have custom built.These devices will soon be available under the 'Accex' business branch. The ED-IT DJ's are currently working on a new record label under the monicker 'Lolopext Recording', so make sure to keep an ear out for that. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. B56002LC_b will dispatch 1-3 days after purchase.

name: B5100Jx from the ED-IT DJ's - (Limited edition of 5)
description: The B5100Jx release is a limited edition of 5 of this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100 comes with a well used underground club desk and two miniature 'Accex' sound creating devices. B5100Jx stands at 16.5cm / 6.6" tall. Please see postage information below. Background: Back in the summer of 2068, the ED-IT DJ's performed a legendary night at the 'Yes More' club in deepest Okinawa with a crowd of over five thousand in attendance. This BJ100Jx release is to remember that night as one of the pioneering events in the revolution of non human created electronic music. Official Information: Tesselate is proud to announce that he has won the licence to produce official limited edition ED-IT merchandise. After many meetings and lengthy discussions with the group, we have big plans going forward. ED-IT are a group of technology based DJ's who have grown into a large force within the underground music scene. Ever since the 2068 'Law of Awareness' which granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, the group has gained a following and have rapidly taken their performances worldwide. Based in the UK, Toyko & Berlin, they have a residency at their underground clubs 'Ready Place', where they play at least once a month. All of the machines they use to create their music and also play music live, they have custom built.These devices will soon be available under the 'Accex' business branch. B5100 is one of the joint founders of the ED-IT group. Before the awareness law was passed, he was working on governmental architectural projects as an electrical maintenance droid, and then DJ'd in his off time in the then illegal 'fully auto' underground club nights. The ED-IT DJ's are currently working on a new record label under the monicker 'Lolopext Recording', so make sure to keep an ear out for that. Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can Orders will dispatch 5-7 days after purchase.

name: B5600sec1 - from the ED-IT DJ's team - (Limited edition of 1)
description: *Available Tuesday 17th January at 9pm (GMT UK time)* The B5600sec1 release is limited to just 1. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100 stands at 15.3cm / 6" tall. Please see postage information lower down. Background: When performing, the ED-IT DJ's have a very strong team around them. Formed of primarily colleagues from the factory days, they have an eclectic mix of skills and will always work their hardest. B5600sec1 is in charge of security and it's not hard to tell why. His head unit has four visual sensors which enable a full 360 'double' degree view at all times, whilst being packed with state of the art 'BlueZoom' technology that allow a for massive resolutions and amazing clarity. He is also very agile, and can often be seen scurrying throughout the nearest gantry to get the optimum view to protect his team. His exterior casing is super toughened, which affords him extra protection when any rogue droids have to be ejected from a show. He often carries a few scuffs and scars on his person, but it's all part of the job for our B5600sec1. He really is one bad ass. Official ED-IT DJ's Information: Tesselate is proud to announce that he has won the licence to produce official limited edition ED-IT merchandise. After many meetings and lengthy discussions with the group, we have big plans going forward. ED-IT are a group of technology based DJ's who have grown into a large force within the underground music scene. Ever since the 2068 'Law of Awareness' which granted all non human creations the same right as humans themselves, the group has gained a following and have rapidly taken their performances worldwide. Based in the UK, Toyko & Berlin, they have a residency at their underground clubs 'Ready Place', where they play at least once a month. All of the machines they use to create their music and also play music live, they have custom built.These devices will soon be available under the 'Accex' business branch. The ED-IT DJ's are currently working on a new record label under the monicker 'Lolopext Recording', so make sure to keep an ear out for that. Note: The scuffs and scrapes on B5600sec are part of the design. (Remember, he has to deal with Class 4 Military Droids from time to time) Postage information: UK: Special Delivery Next Day (from dispatch), fully insured for £100, requires a signature on arrival and can be tracked. International orders: To keep costs down, International shipping will be sent via Standard Airmail, which is not tracked and is uninsured. This option is totally at the buyers own risk if a package was to go missing. If you would prefer an insured service, please do say and I can send over an invoice for the extra cost. Orders will dispatch 5-7 days after purchase.

name: B5100 from the ED-IT DJ's - (Limited edition of 5)

First up is B5100 in a limited edition of 5 of this colourway. Each figure is hand cast in resin, painted and finished by myself, and will come super securely packaged when dispatched. B5100 comes with a well used underground club desk and two miniature 'Accex' sound creating devices. B5100 stands at 16.5cm / 6.6" tall. Please see postage information lower down. name: George and his Amazing Blue Dispensing Machine.
description: George and his amazing blue dispensing machine is handmade in resin, foamex, acrylic and super sculpey. This is a one off design, never to be reproduced. This is a one off design, never to be reproduced. Painted in acrylics, spray paints and decorated with posca pens, and finished off with a few coats of clear acrylic sealer. The Amazing Blue Dispensing Machine stands at 7.5inches / 19cm tall. Marching across the lands on his amazing machine comes George aided by the his legion of tiny friends. The aim of this gargantuan creation is to spread the delicious blue wherever they can. Blue is a wonderful creation which when harvested and formed into perfect spheres, can be used for almost anything you so wish. George converted a once military walking gun platform for his ongoing mission. He has previously stated that his blue giving mission will never end (apart from Saturday afternoons, when he is performing essential maintenance) Go George and his tiny circular/non circular friends! See more photos at http://www.madebytesselate.com George and his amazing blue dispensing machine will be securely packaged for it's postal journey. Uk Postage will be via recorded delivery so a signature will be required. International postage can either be via Standard Airmal (non tracked) or Airsure (which is tracked and insured). The international postage on this will be Standard Airmail as default, so if you would like Airsure please do contact me after purchase and I can invoice for the difference.

name: Big Boris - 8" Custom Dunny
description:
* Will be live on the shop 6pm BST (London time)  on Friday 8th April *

Big Boris is my very first custom 8" Dunny. Limited to just this one.

Hand-painted with acrylics, also using posca markers and a bit of spray paint. This is limited to just one and is signed on the bottom of the foot.

Boris will come packaged in an original customised Dunny box with blister packaging so will be very secure, I will also chuck in some Tesselate vinyl stickers for the buyer :)

Postage to UK and International includes signed for delivery and insurance for £100. If you would like a lower postage price without insurance etc, that can be arranged.

name: Commissions
description:
Commissions:

If you are interested in commissioning a piece, please do email me at : me@madebytesselate.com

Please send over as much information as you can regarding what platform you would like me to work on, be it one of my own or anything else. Also colours, theme etc.

Pricing will differ from platform to platform, as well as size and complexity of what you are looking for.

cheers

Tesselate
